name: Planet Pursuer
description:
It's move in day for two  planet-stabbing aliens. Or is it? Their new home keeps teleporting away!

By Scoot-O-Speed Studios

Controls
  • WASD to Move,
  • Space to Shoot
  • E to begin Warping a planet
  • Q to Activate Teleport and gain some distance from the Aliens
  • Backspace to Back Out of saving a planet
The Story

You're a just planet (yes, you read that right) minding your own business when suddenly two JERKFACE ALIENS showed up in their massive ship and tried to stab you with a flag. Um... rude! And probably murder... You escape just in time with the help of the good ol' safe ol' black hole.

Now, dash and teleport your way through different galaxies with the aliens in hot pursuit. Dodge their attacks and save other planets from the same fate. Planet bois gotta stick up for each other in the face of stabby alien colonization! 

Scoring

You gain points for each correct key pressed in sequence when helping other planets escape. Bonus points for streaks of correct keys! 

You also gain 1 planet point per saved planet, which you can use to purchase upgrades.
